title: Outreach - IGERT Electronic Security and Privacy: Technological, Human, Enterprise, and Legal Considerations
contents: Search this site     Program Overview Sponsors FAQ People Faculty Staff Fellows Associates Alumni Research Publications Curriculum Courses Seminars Outreach International Partners Links And Resources Internships CyberCorps SFS Alumni HS-STEM Scholarships Apply           News ESP-IGERT Calendar Departments Contact Us Sitemap            Outreach     The ESP IGERT program has established collaborations with several international partners and industry. Our students have the opportunity to participate in one summer research internship at the Politecnico di Milano, Italy or the National University of Singapore and in one summer internship with our industry partners. Our students will also be involved in one project reaching to high school students and teachers in the Chicago area. This project will involve training students and teachers in the issues of ESP.                       Sign in | Recent Site Activity | Report Abuse | Print Page | Powered By  Google Sites
